books.title: Cracking the Coding Interview 189 Programming Questions and Solutions
books.author: Gayle Laakmann McDowell
books.info: I am not a recruiter. I am a software engineer. And as such, I know what it's like to be asked to whip up brilliant algorithms on the spot and then write flawless code on a whiteboard. I've been through this as a candidate and as an interviewer.

books.title: Advanced API Security OAuth 2.0 And Beyond
books.author: Prabath Siriwardena
books.info: Prepare for the next wave of challenges in enterprise security. Learn to better protect, monitor, and manage your public and private APIs.
